document.full_text: a white man was convicted on thursday of setting fire to a mostly black church in november 2008 to protest barack obama's election as the nation's first black president.
document.title: white man convicted over black church fire to protest obama win
lines_and_colors: a white man was convicted on thursday of setting fire to a mostly black church in november 2008 to protest barack obama's election as the nation's first black president.
